title: Replace header logo with custom Beyblade X image

requirements.summary: Replace the text-based logo in the AppHeader component with the custom Beyblade X image
acceptanceCriteria: The AppHeader component displays the custom Beyblade X image instead of the text 'Bey Hub X'
The logo image is properly sized and positioned in the header
The logo maintains its aspect ratio and visual quality
The logo is clickable and navigates to the home page
The logo is responsive and displays correctly on mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Replace the text-based logo with an img element that references the generated Beyblade X logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/beyblade-x-logo.dim_200x80.png. Ensure the image is wrapped in a link to navigate home, has appropriate alt text, maintains proper sizing (max-height of 40-50px to fit header), and is responsive across mobile and desktop viewports. Keep all existing authentication controls, theme toggle, and navigation menu structure intact.
